ideas.title: Who Believes God Forgives? Comprehensive Cross-Cultural Analysis of Divine Punishment and Forgiveness Beliefs
ideas.rationale: High-novelty descriptive contribution integrating 5 freely available datasets on divine punishment/forgiveness beliefs. Human-directed topic with confirmed data accessibility. Appropriate methodological approach (descriptive + correlational) for the contribution type.

note: Human-directed paper. Standard discovery/ranking pipeline bypassed by user request. Topic, data sources, and methodology specified by human researcher.
